title: Mind Over Matter
description: Young the Giant have become one of my favorite groups, and they don't get nearly enough credit. *Mind Over Matter* is a great album, and their other two records are great as well.

title: Viva La Vida Or Death And All His Friends
description: Coldplay gets a lot of hate, but I love their music and lyrics. Then again, I'm a hopeless romantic. *Viva* is Coldplay at their best. See them live if you can.

title: What Went Down
description: You should check out _all_ of their music, but _What Went Down_ is a great starting point for Foals. They started back in 2005 in the UK and have been slowing bleeding into America. They are probably in my top 5 new groups of the past decade or so. Be sure to check out _Birch Tree_ and _Lonely Hunter_.
